definition: Yuanli town in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
Yuanli town in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan

sentences.english: The park had fine trees, and there were deer roaming among them.
sentences.chinese: 猎苑里树木优良，鹿漫游于树间。

sentences.english: He had to make a lake in the gentleman's park .
sentences.chinese: 他必须在绅士的猎苑里挖一个湖。

sentences.english: I find there are so many interesting things in the Museum of Yin Ruins.
sentences.chinese: 我发现这殷墟博物苑里的好东西太多了。

definition: warm room/warm partition of a room
reception pavilion (generally part of a large residence, and often built in a garden)
heating/central heating/greenhouse/hothouse/to pay a house-warming visit
oriole or various birds of the Sylvidae family including warblers
